data.title: Charles Bukowski
data.text:
AKA Henry Charles Bukowski, Jr.

Born: 16-Aug-1920

Birthplace: Andernach, Germany

Died: 9-Mar-1994

Location of death: San Pedro, CA

Cause of death: Cancer - Leukemia

Remains: Buried, Green Hills Memorial Park, Rancho Palos Verdes, CA

Gender: Male

Religion: Atheist

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Author, Poet

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Love is a Dog from Hell

Father: Henry Charles Bukowski (d. 4-Dec-1958)

Mother: Katharina Fett (d. 24-Dec-1956)

Wife: Barbara Frye (m. 29-Oct-1955, div. 18-Mar-1958)

Girlfriend: Frances Smith

Daughter: Marina Louise Bukowski Stone (b. 7-Sep-1964)

Wife: Linda Lee Beighle (m. 18-Aug-1985)

Girlfriend: Jane Cooney Baker (d. 22-Jan-1962)

High School: Los Angeles High School, Los Angeles, CA (1939)

University: Los Angeles City College (1939-41 and 1956-57)

US Postal Service Los Angeles, CA

Draft Evasion Philadelphia, PA (22-Jul-1944)

Draft Deferment: World War II

Drunk in Public Los Angeles, CA (14-May-1948)

Suicide Attempt 1961

Drunk in Public Los Angeles, CA (17-Dec-1962)

Drunk in Public Los Angeles, CA (12-Aug-1963)

Hemorrhoid Operation 2-Mar-1966

German Ancestry Maternal

Risk Factors: Alcoholism, Smoking, Cocaine, Marijuana, LSD, Peyote, Hemorrhoids, Skin Cancer, Tuberculosis

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Loren Cass (25-Aug-2006)

Is the subject of books:

Hank: The Life of Charles Bukowski, 1991, BY: Neeli Cherkovski

Locked in the Arms of a Crazy Life, 1998, BY: Howard Sounes

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
